name: Doodle Super Hero
description:
Do you like Super Heroes? Do you like fighting games? Do you like cool and addictive games? You've come to the right place. "Doodle Super Hero : Fighting Game" is a funny action game, that you can play for 100s of hours and not get bored.

Fight with bad gangsters and become the best Doodle SuperHero on the earth! Show your amazing skills and defeat every villain. Collect points, unlock new superheroes and fighting locations. Save humanity and the universe from the shadow of evil.

Are you ready to have a lot of not interrupted fun? With no annoying ads and in-app purchases? Download "Doodle Super Hero : Fighting Game" now!

Features:

* Premium version with no ads and no in-app purchases
* Simple, funny and very addictive game
* Fight with the villains and collect points
* Unlock all super hero characters
* Unlock all fighting locations
* Quick fight mode
* Incredible combos
* Easy to play : Tap left or right sides of the screen to fight
* Game is the mix of action and arcade games
* Original doodle drawing style
* Great time killer
